title: The Man Widely Regarded As The Best Cricket Commentator Ever
text:
Remembering Richie Benaud On His Birthday - The Man Widely Regarded As The Best Cricket Commentator Ever

Remembering Richie Benaud On His Birthday - The Man Widely Regarded As The Best Cricket Commentator Ever

If you are a genuine cricket fan, then there's absolute possibility of you having come across the voice of legendary Richie Benaud.

Getty Images

The magical voice on the microphone that was as soothing as any, always was music to our ears. The analysis and reading of the game was far beyond imagination and a craft Banaud mastered like no other.

If there is one word to describe Richie Benaud, it is influential. Such was his mastery over the language and his analysis was so

thorough, it gave people the feeling that they were listening to ‘The Godfather of cricket commentary.’

Here are his top five quotes from the commentary box:

1. A no-nonsense approach to commentary
